name: Gravitus (Stupid Robot)
description:
Lander-like game with different gravities. 10 levels. 

Game submitted for the GMTK 2020 Gam Jam.

Controls:

- Thrust = up or W

- Left/right = left/right or A/D

- Toggle the music on/off = M

- Restart the game = Escape button

Music made by Tallbeard Studios: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Font made by datagoblin:  https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram
